tests.name: BOOLEAN literal
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, TRUE, True, true, FALSE, False, false FROM INPUT;

tests.name: INT literal min/max
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, -00002147483647 AS MIN, 000002147483647 AS MAX FROM INPUT;

tests.name: BIGINT literal min/max
tests.note: Long.MIN_VALUE is actually -9223372036854775808, which KSQL can not handle as the LongLiteral is stored unsigned
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, -00009223372036854775807 AS MIN, 000009223372036854775807 AS MAX FROM INPUT;

tests.name: DOUBLE literal min/max
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, 04.90E-324 AS MIN_VALUE, -4.9E-324 AS NEG_MIN_VALUE, 2.2250738585072014E-308 AS MIN_NORMAL, -2.2250738585072014E-308 AS NEG_MIN_NORMAL, 1.7976931348623157E308 AS MAX_VALUE, -1.7976931348623157E308 AS NEG_MAX_VALUE FROM INPUT;

tests.name: BIGINT literal positive overflow
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, 9223372036854775808 FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Failed to prepare statement: line 2:37: Invalid numeric literal: 9223372036854775808

tests.name: BIGINT literal negative overflow
tests.note: Long.MIN_VALUE is actually -9223372036854775808, which KSQL can not handle as the LongLiteral is stored unsigned
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, -9223372036854775808 FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Failed to prepare statement: line 2:38: Invalid numeric literal: 9223372036854775808

tests.name: DOUBLE literal positive overflow
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, 1.7976931348623159E308 FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Failed to prepare statement: line 2:37: Number overflows DOUBLE: 1.7976931348623159E308

tests.name: DOUBLE literal negative overflow
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select id, -1.7976931348623159E308 FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Failed to prepare statement: line 2:38: Number overflows DOUBLE: 1.7976931348623159E308
